content.raw:
following cloudsim tutorial:

http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Tutorials/CloudSim/1.2/setup

at command:

cloudsim-1.2.0/bin$ ./create_cloudsim.py username key secret_key region

results in:

inside/cgi-bin
cloudsimd/launchers
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./create_cloudsim.py", line 40, in <module>
    import common
ImportError: No module named common

Adding "inside/cgi-bin/common" resulted in no change in python's response.
 
Did I miss something?
content.html:
following cloudsim tutorial:

http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Tutorials/CloudSim/1.2/setup

at command:

cloudsim-1.2.0/bin$ ./create_cloudsim.py username key secret_key region

results in:

inside/cgi-bin cloudsimd/launchers Traceback (most recent call last): File "./create_cloudsim.py", line 40, in <module> import common ImportError: No module named common

Adding "inside/cgi-bin/common" resulted in no change in python's response.

Did I miss something?
